name: SHANGHAI ANGEL - 18+ Adult Only
description:
Story

Sara finds out that her sister has been kidnapped by the dark organization J. But with her unable to call the police or ask others for help, Sarah is determined. She decides to rescue her sister by herself.

Sarah has previous experience with the dark world, so she has an unshakable resolve and strong mental strength in the dark. She is burrowing and leaves no trace, constantly gathering information.

Sarah moves cautiously to avoid encountering her enemies as she sneaks into her organization's territory. With her quick and precise judgment, she meticulously figures out where her sister is trapped and plans her best way to rescue her.

Even in her dangerous situation, her Sarah continues her forced march, using her memories and love with her as strength. Her time is running out, but her sister doesn't lose hope and focuses on finding her sister.

Action Belt Scroll Game !!

- key features -

Fast Action Play: Simple yet addictive fast action play, players experience gameplay that requires instant reaction and skill.

Variety of Weapons and Tools: Utilize a wide variety of weapons and tools to diversify the way you fight and try out new strategies to defeat your enemies.

Exciting level design: Each level is filled with unique designs and obstacles, puzzles, boss battles and more to keep you from getting bored and providing new challenges over and over again.

Character Progression: Players can develop their own powerful warrior by upgrading their character's stats and skills as they progress through the game.

Familiar Controls and Difficulty Adjustment: Players can enjoy the game to their preference by providing familiar controls and difficulty adjustment options for beginners to advanced players alike.
